content: I worked and wrote for the UFC for almost 7 years. I knew Chael. I was asked in 2007, “Who is the biggest A____ole in the UFC?” And the answer was always the same, “Chael Sonnen.” People would say, “Who?” Then I would go on to tell them what I knew. Then came the PEDs, the housing scam he pulled, etc. Yes, he’s a promoter, but he’s also trash.
